main.title: United by hope: We make the future for children better
main.subtitle: HelpWay Charitable Foundation

items.first: Provide children with opportunities to live and develop
items.second: Expand horizons and nurture children's talents
items.third: Ensure access to education and medical care
items.fourth: Restore childhood and offer love and support
items.fifth: Build a stable and safe environment for children
items.six: Foster their physical, psychological, and social development
